# Arvind Natarajan - AI Engineer & Full Stack Developer

## Professional Profile
Arvind Natarajan is a Computer Science undergraduate at the National University of Singapore (NUS) and an AI Engineer at Carecam. He specializes in:
- **Artificial Intelligence**: Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing (NLP), PyTorch, Mediapipe, Transformers.
- **Full Stack Development**: React, Vite, Node.js, Firebase, PostgreSQL.
- **Mobile Development**: Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile (KMM).

## Core Skills
- **Languages**: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Kotlin, C++, SQL.
- **Frameworks & Libraries**: PyTorch, React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js.
- **Tools & DevOps**: Docker, Kubernetes, Git, GitHub Actions, Azure.

## Projects

### Klingon Heads
- **Description**: An AI-driven English to Klingon translator web application.
- **Tech Stack**: React, PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers (T5), GRU models.
- **Link**: [https://klingon-heads.vercel.app/](https://klingon-heads.vercel.app/)

### MapMyMemories
- **Description**: A geo-tagging photo gallery app with Google Auth and dark mode.
- **Tech Stack**: React, Firebase, Tailwind CSS.
- **Link**: [https://map-my-memories-three.vercel.app/](https://map-my-memories-three.vercel.app/)

### Telegram Wellness Bot
- **Description**: A therapy support bot using the Mixtral-8x7B LLM.
- **Tech Stack**: Python, Azure, Telegram API.

## Experience

### Carecam (AI Engineer)
*Dec 2023 - Present*
- Developing computer vision solutions for healthcare.
- Building mobile applications using Kotlin Multiplatform.

### National University of Singapore (Research Assistant)
*Jan 2024 - Present*
- researching advanced NLP models and architectures.

## Education
- **National University of Singapore (NUS)**: Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science (2023 - 2027).
- **St. Joseph's Institution**: International Baccalaureate Diploma.

## Certifications
- NUS Health HacK 2025 - Top 3 (InterSystems Track)
- Orbital Achievement - Apollo 11 (Top Level)
- DevOps, MLOps, and DataOps (Duke University)
